description: This file defines the ToDoItemControl class, a UI component for individual todo list items, handling states, events, and interactions within a todo app.

classes.name: todomvc.view.ToDoItemControl
classes.description: A UI control representing a single todo list item, managing states, events, and user interactions.

methods.name: enterDocument
methods.description: Sets up event listeners after the component's DOM is rendered, handling clicks, double-clicks, and keyup events for editing and toggling.

methods.name: getRenderer
methods.description: Returns the renderer instance used to render or decorate the component.

methods.name: handleMouseUp
methods.description: Handles mouse up events on the control, toggling checked state or dispatching destroy event based on target.

methods.name: setFocused
methods.description: Overrides default to handle focus loss, saving or destroying the item based on input content.

methods.name: setSelected
methods.description: Overrides default to switch to editing mode when selected, populating input with current content.
